tool.name: SAGA.ta_preprocessor.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArraySINKROUTE False output_data_DEM_PREPROC $output_data_DEM_PREPROC name SAGA.ta_preprocessor.2 DEM $DEM SINKROUTE $SINKROUTE METHOD $METHOD THRESHOLD $THRESHOLD THRSHEIGHT $THRSHEIGHT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_DEM_PREPROC $OutputSection_DEM_PREPROC.outputType_DEM_PREPROC transmissionMode_DEM_PREPROC $OutputSection_DEM_PREPROC.transmissionMode_DEM_PREPROC

param.name: DEM
param.label: DEM
param.help: Digital Elevation Model that has to be processed The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: SINKROUTE
param.label: Sink Route
param.help: Sink Route The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: THRSHEIGHT
param.label: Threshold Height
param.help: The parameter describes the maximum depth of a sink to be considered for removal [map units]. This makes it possible to exclude deeper sinks from filling.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_DEM_PREPROC
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_DEM_PREPROC
param.label: Preprocessed DEM
param.help: Preprocessed DEM. If this is not set changes will be stored in the original DEM grid.
